summary.description:
new binding kinetics database and its integration in an open-source binding analysis software.

Kinetics OF Featured Interactions.

KOFFI-DB (???) is an article based database for kinetic constants of biomolecular interactions. We focused on interactions between DNA, RNA, proteins and chemical compounds. All datapoints were manually annotated and reviewed based on open source articles available on Europe PMC
summary.name: KOFFI
